create-new-wallet: Forge a new Dynex Chest o’ Booty
create-where-tostore: Choose where yer chest shall be stowed
create-set-password: Set a secret key fer openin’ this chest
open-wallet: Unlock yer Dynex Chest o’ Booty
import-keys-import: Smuggle private keys t’ restore a chest
import-keys-location: Choose where yer chest be stowed
import-keys-password: Set a secret key fer openin’ this chest
import-keys-importinfo: Smuggle private keys ‘n restore yer chest
import-seed-import: Smuggle Mnemonic Treasure Map ‘n restore yer chest
import-seed-location: Choose where yer chest be stowed
import-seed-password: Set a secret key fer openin’ this chest
import-seed-button: Smuggle treasure map ‘n restore yer chest
send-amount-info: Enter th’ loot ye wish t’ send
send-to-info: Search yer Book o’ Mates or enter a new map
transactions-datanotavailable: Transaction details not yet written in th’ ledger
transactions-notsynced: Ye’ve no plunder yet or yer chest be syncin’
bridge-chain-info: Choose yer ocean t’ sail t’
bridge-walletid-info: Supply an address t’ where yer wrapped Dynex loot be sent
bridge-amount-info: Amount o’ DNX ye wish t’ send fer wrapping
backup-safety-msg: Backing up yer key be a vital step t’ keepin’ yer Dynex safe. The secret keys below be able t’ restore yer chest usin’ the Dynex Electron Wallet. This key be highly valuable ‘n sensitive. NEVER SHARE this key with another soul! If ye lose this key or it falls in th’ wrong hands, yer loot could be plundered! Keep it safe by printing two scrolls ‘n hiding ‘em in two different secret havens. Lose these keys ‘n delete yer chest file, ‘n yer booty be lost forever!
backup-safety-msg2: This key be essential t’ protectin’ yer chest o’ treasures ‘n funds from bein’ lost t’ th’ depths.
backup-safety-msg3: Do not store it on any gadget! Ye alone be responsible fer keepin’ it secure.
backup-your-viewkey-info: This key be free o’ spaces
backup-your-spendkey-info: This key be free o’ spaces
backup-your-seed-info: Th’ mnemonic seed always holds 25 words
backup-safety-msg4: Keep yer keys hidden ‘n secret! Anyone with ‘em can claim yer chest!
settings-service-path: Set the Path t’ DNX-Service Executable
settings-node-path: Set the Path t’ DNX-Node Executable
settings-dhip-eth-info: This lets ye monitor yer 0xDNX DHIP Loot Participation
settings-qnode-subgrp-info: This lets ye keep an eye on yer Quantum Nodes
settings-language-info: Choose th’ language o’ yer crew
about-title: This software be a GUI front-end fer managing Dynex (DNX). Ye can use it t’ create new chests, import old ones, or open existing Dynex Electron Chests. Manage yer plunder, view yer treasure count, log o’ transactions, ‘n send DNX. Ye can find source codes, release notes, ‘n bug trackers on our Github page
about-license-p2: Ye be free t’ use, copy, or modify this software fer any purpose, with or without fee, as long as this notice remains
about-license-p3: THIS SOFTWARE BE AS IS! THE CREATORS DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, EVEN IMPLIED ONES. THEY BE NOT LIABLE FER DAMAGES CAUSED BY USIN’ THIS SOFTWARE, WHETHER DIRECT, INDIRECT, OR CONSEQUENTIAL.
settings-js-invalidnode: Invalid daemon/node port number, ye scallywag!
settings-js-unabletofind2: please enter the correct path, ye landlubber!
settings-js-unabletosave: Settings can't be saved, enter correct values, or walk the plank!
qnode_js_offline: Offline, like a ship in the doldrums.
qnode_js_working: Workin' hard as a pirate in full sail!
addressbook_js_areyousure1: Be ye sure ye want to delete
addressbook_js_addr_deleted: Address book entry be deleted, shiver me timbers!
addressbook_js_addr_empty: Address of contact and Label can't be empty, ye bilge rat!
addressbook_js_addr_invalid: Invalid, like a map without X marks!
addressbook_js_addr_exists: This combination of address and payment ID already exists, find a new map or ID!
addressbook_js_addr_saved: The address book contact be saved, arrr!
addressbook_js_invalid_paymentid: Invalid Payment ID, ye scurvy dog!
keybinding_new_wallet: Switch to Forge a new treasure chest screen
keybinding_import_private_keys: Switch to Smuggle in secret keys screen
keybinding_import_mnemonic_seed: Switch to Smuggle in mnemonic code screen
keybinding_export_keys: Switch to Export secret keys screen (when chest opened)
keybinding_transactions: Switch to Loot Logs screen (when chest opened)
keybinding_close_dialog: Close any opened dialog (like this dialog)
send_addr_error3: Sorry, can’t send to yer own map!
send_addr_error4: Sorry, invalid Payment ID, ye blunderin' fool!
send_addr_error9: Ye don’t have enough booty fer this transfer!
send_js_transfer_plzconfirm: Confirm yer details before settin' sail!
send_js_sent_balancewrong: Yer balance may be wrong while transactions confirm
send_js_sent_failed: Failed to send, curse the Kraken!
send_js_bridge_plzconfirm: Confirm yer bridge details, ye seadog!
send_js_bridge_sending_wait: Sending bridge transaction, batten down the hatches!
send_js_bridge_sent_balancewrong: Balance may be wrong while bridge confirms
transactions_js_exportedto_fail: Export failed, try again ye lubber!
system_wallet_sync_enteramount: Enter the booty ye be wantin' to send
system_wallet_alreadyopen: Ye must close yer current chest before openin' another, matey!
system_wallet_notopened: No chest be open at the moment, arrr!
system_wallet_pleaseclose: Close yer current chest before creatin' or importin' a new one, savvy?
system_wallet_pleaseopen_transactions: Open yer chest to spy yer treasure logs
system_wallet_pleaseopen_transfer: Open yer chest to send some booty
system_synchronization: Syncin' the loot, hold yer cutlasses steady!
system_optimization: Sharpenin' yer chest, wait a spell, matey
system_optimization_confirm: Ye be about to polish yer chest o' loot. This may take a fair bit, be ye certain?
system_optimization_started: Chest polishin' be underway! Yer balance may look fishy durin' the process.
system_invalid_node_addr: Ye entered a scallywag's daemon address!
system_invalid_node_port: Arrr! That be no valid daemon port number!
system_invalid_password: Enter the secret o' the chest, ye bilge rat!
system_invalid_wallet_path: That wallet path be as wrong as a drunken sailor!
system_invalid_unable_to_open1: Can't be openin' the chest, matey!
system_invalid_unable_to_open2: Yer secret word be as wrong as a one-eyed parrot!
system_starting_wallet_service: Settin' up the ship fer yer chest service...
system_error_wallet_service: Couldn't hoist the service sails, cap'n!
system_opening: Crackin' open yer chest, hold tight!
system_validating_password: Checkin' the chest's secret, wait ye must!
system_opening_node_warning: Enter a proper daemon port and address, ye scurvy dog!
system_create: Forge a new chest or open one fer plunderin’
system_pleasewait: Hold yer anchor ‘til the syncin’ be done
system_walletfusion_inprogress: Polishin’ yer chest, give it a moment
system_wallet_created: Yer chest be forged! Open it now, ye hearty!
system_wallet_imported: Chest imported! Time to open it, arrr!
system_wallet_create_passblank: Ye must enter a secret word! Chests without a secret be forbidden by pirate law!
system_wallet_create_unableoverwrite: Can’t overwrite an old chest! Choose a fresh file path, ye landlubber!
system_wallet_invalid_scanheight: Invalid scan height! Check yer coordinates!
system_wallet_blank_key: The View Key and Spend Key can’t be left blank, ye scallywag!
system_wallet_invalid_spendkey: That Spend Key be not fit fer the likes of pirates!
system_wallet_failedkey: Failed to fetch yer key! Try again in a moment, me hearty!
system_wallet_keys_exported: Yer keys be exported! Guard ‘em as ye would yer life!
system_wallet_keys_exported_fail: Couldn’t stash yer keys! Check if ye can write to the file, ye landlubber!
system_wallet_saving_msg: Stowin’ and lockin’ up yer chest...
system_wallet_close_confirm: Be ye certain ye want to close the chest?
system_wallet_qrcode: Here be the QR code fer yer chest’s location
